article:
We kids have different ways to get in touch with each other now. And _ the old, they'd like to go to the market or _ each other's houses, but for the young, we kids needn't follow the _ of doing so.
The _ way for us to get in touch and make _ is to use the Internet services, like QQ. A lot of websites such as www.qq.com have appeared   in the last few years and offered such kinds of services for free. So we can make friends _ through the Internet. Maybe we do not _ all these "friends" well. We add friends only how we seem cooler with more friends online.
Then _ do we kids keep in touch with friends online? We make it by sending our _ to each other. At times, "friends" _ "be missing" for months without a message. Is this the friendship in the 21st century?
Of course, using these Internet services is not just for saying "Hi, what's up?" Some of us have found long-lost classmates and friends _ these websites. And at times we kill a time to go to a movie or get together. What's more, we kids can listen to our friends' favourite music when we are on the Internet.
Believe it or not, these Internet services will be _ for a while, and it is _ a convenient way for us to keep in touch.
